content: Apt Medium!!! I think there’s something to that, tho, for real. It happens a lot to me on Facebook, where I’ll be quietly obsessing over something and then three friends will post about that exact thing. My…suspicion? is that the better we get to know each other, the more closely our ‘waves’ line up. Omg stop typing. Shhhh. (But yes ignoring my woo-woo waves bit, I totally know what you’re talking about. 😊)
